name: Set Git LFS preference

previews.name: barred-rock
previews.description:
The source import APIs are currently in public preview. See the [source import](https://developer.github.com/v3/previews/#source-import) preview for more details. To access the API during the preview period, you must provide a custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/v3/media) in the `Accept` header:

```
  application/vnd.github.barred-rock-preview

```

params.name: use_lfs
params.description: Can be one of `opt_in` (large files will be stored using Git LFS) or `opt_out` (large files will be removed during the import).

description: You can import repositories from Subversion, Mercurial, and TFS that include files larger than 100MB. This ability is powered by [Git LFS](https://git-lfs.github.com). You can learn more about our LFS feature and working with large files [on our help site](https://help.github.com/articles/versioning-large-files/).
